title: Drawing, "Breakfront Design", September 1958
medium:
Graphite, red pencil, ruled border in red pencil
Support: tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in red pencil at upper left: NOTE: / MR. DESKEY WAS UNCERTAIN AS/TO WHETHER OR NOT HE APPROVED / THE LOCATION OF THE PULLS ON THE / DOORS OFTHE TOP SECTION AND / SUGGESTED THAT THIS BE DECIDED /UPON WHEN THE ENTIRE UNIT ARRIVES IN N.Y / ANY CHANGE, HOWEVER WILL / DECREASE THE OPERATING EFFICIENCY / OF THIS FOLDING TYPE OF DOOR / 9/8/58; at lower left; phone call 9/15/58; in graphite at lower center: HARDWARE LAYOUT / #D-650 BREAKFRONT; inscribed in graphite and red pencil with measurements.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Breakfront Design", September 1958.
September 1958. Graphite, red pencil, ruled border in red pencil
Support: tracing paper. Gift of E. Paul Charak. 1987-1-15.
